page.title: 02INSTOW YOUTH HOSTEL
page.content: The youth hostel is housed in a rambling old Victorian house. The previous occupant grew rare bulbs in its large and sheltered garden. Being just off a busy holiday route, the hostel is very busy. There are plenty of attractions in the surrounding area for prospective visitors. The building itself still retains its old character. There are marble fireplaces and high ceilings. However, the facilities offered to visitors are very good i.e. common room, drying room, a large members' kitchen and even an outside classroom. It has family rooms as well as the usual dormitories.
